instaAnalyze_key2: Humein ek instagram ke liye `bot` banana hai, jo mere instagram followers ki posts ka sentiment analysis karega.
instaAnalyze_key4: Instagram se data scrap karne ke liye aapko
instaAnalyze_key6:
library use karni hai.
Sentiment analysis ke liye aapko -
instaAnalyze_key10:
Aapko apne saare instagram followers ki saari descriptions download kar kar {username}.txt naame ki `files` mei dump karna hai. Har ek new line mei ek nayi post ka content store hoga.

Toh agar aapke 10 followers hai, toh 10 `files` hongi, jismei unki har ek instagram post ke liye ek nayi line hogi.
Jaisa agar mai aapko follow karta hu, toh abhishekgupta921.txt mei meri saari instagram posts ek ek line mei hogi.
instaAnalyze_key12: Ab aapko sentiment analysis padh kar samajhna hai ki kya hota hai. Aap NLTK use kar kar ek simple sa sentiment analyser banaye jo
instaAnalyze_key14: data par kaam karta hai. Dhyaan rakhein, ki simply Naive Bayes Classifier use karna, isse aapko kam efforts lagenge. Internet par bahut saare tutorials hai jo yeh karne mei aapki help karenge.
instaAnalyze_key15: Ab iss `code` ko aise modify karo ki aap ka analyzer jo kaggle se jo data hai, uss par train ho, par instagram posts ko analyse karein. Iske baad aap aisa kuch print karoge:
